missions.name: The Car
missions.description:
I tracked down the car belonging to that license plate number you found. The owner is an ex-Marine named Arlo Johnson. Apparently he is a registered voter here. Anyway, thanks to the city's obsession with parking tickets, I can track down the car's location whenever it gets scanned by a meter maid.

 I think if you search the car you might find some useful information. 

Once I give you the car's current location, you aren't going to have much time to get there before the driver gets back, so be sure to hurry.

missions.name: The Key
missions.description:
You got quite a haul from that car. Court documents, business cards, blueprints, but most important is that key! I've done some research and I think that key can unlock some secrets.

You ready for some breaking and entering? I have some locations I want you to visit.
